response.headline: Shukutsu Panorama Observation Deck recommended for best sunset views in Hokkaido
response.summary: Shukutsu Panorama Observation Deck is highlighted as probably one of the best sunset views in Hokkaido. The recommendation comes from a travel post about visiting Hokkaido during summer, specifically part of a July Japan travel series.

extracted_text: Probably one of the best sunset views in Hokkaido
